Name: maximize_product_backlog_size
Description: The size of the product backlog should be maximized.

Name: minimize_product_backlog_duration
Description: Minimize the total duration of tasks in the product backlog.

Name: minimize DevelopmentSnapshot version number
Description: Minimize the version number of the latest DevelopmentSnapshot.

Name: maximize_user_story_acceptance_rate
Description: Maximize the percentage of user stories that are accepted.

Name: minimize_work_in_progress
Description: Minimize the number of tasks in work-in-progress (WIP).

Name: minimize_task_blocker_impact
Description: Avoid assigning high-severity blockers to tasks.

Name: maximize sprint goal achievement
Description: Maximize the percentage of sprint goals that are achieved.

Name: minimize sprint backlog size
Description: Minimize the number of tasks in the Sprint Backlog.

Name: maximize team satisfaction
Description: Maximize overall team satisfaction during sprints.

Name: minimize sprint duration
Description: Minimize the total sprint duration (in minutes).
